scripts.coverage: NODE_COVERAGE_DEST=coverage-$(date +%Y-%m-%d-%H-%M-%S-%N);istanbul cover -x **/dist/** -x **/lib/build/** node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha -- -R spec test/validation/*.js;mv coverage $NODE_COVERAGE_DEST;xdg-open $NODE_COVERAGE_DEST/lcov-report/index.html
scripts.coveralls: istanbul cover node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- -R spec test/validation/*.js && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | coveralls && rm -rf coverage
